cookingTips: Slice kielbasa into bite-sized pieces for easy serving and even sauce coating
Stir ketchup and jelly together before adding sausage to ensure even coating
Heat on low in slow cooker for 2-3 hours to allow flavors to develop
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Walk the user through creating a sweet and savory glaze that transforms kielbasa into an easy, crowd-pleasing appetizer.
